post:
Hello,

The VPS specs are listed below.

**KVM HDD 500**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Opteron 4334
Unlimited CPU core 3.1GHz
2GB ECC RAM
500GB HDD RAID-5
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Location - France
Price - $4.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=78
</pre>

**KVM HDD Limited CA**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E3-1245 V2
Unlimited CPU core 3.6GHz
2GB ECC RAM
300GB HDD RAID-5
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Location - Canada
Price - $4.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=93
</pre>

Check our website for more KVM offers.

You can order several packages of the same type and combine them into one VM. Also, you can request private networking between your VMs.

The payment gateway is 2Checkout (PayPal).

For anyone interested, there is also an affiliate program - https://www.wishosting.com/plugin/support_manager/knowledgebase/view/18/affiliate-program/1/
